alert.note: Alert for Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 11:39AM MST until November 08 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...Until 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong crosswinds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
